summary: Add new stand alone one handed sword to the game. The weapon rating are the same as daedric sword. Craftable under the ebony section does not need ebony craftable perks.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][b]The Crow Sword[/b][/u]

Add new stand alone one handed sword to the game
The weapon rating are the same as daedric sword
Craftable under the ebony section does not need ebony craftable perks.

[b]Small Note : [/b]

Sorry but no blood textureÂ on the sword

[b]Credits :[/b]

Bethesda

Skyrim Creation Kit

Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thank you for download"[/center]
author: Fachry
